notes:
New in version 1.4.3

• A new blog-style view has been added as an alternative to the classic entries page.

• Markdown notes are now correctly displayed in their respective day columns on the tracker.

• The radar chart for category groups now automatically sets its date range to the last 30 days when opened, preventing empty or invalid values.

• The 'Radar over Category Groups' link now appears only if at least one entry exists.

• Minor interface improvements have been made to the Intelligent Report and Category Info pages.

• An 'Add new entry' column has been added to the Intelligent Report View table.
